name: Legosweeper V1.1!!
description:
Hey there!! It's me here :)) This is the version 1.1 of the Minesweeper mod - Legosweeper! In the middle of this virus pandemic, I was bored with developing Covid-20 P2 so I updated this.

Wait, hold up, what IS Legosweeper???

Well, Legosweeper is a modded version of Minesweeper, which you'll be placed in a Lego-nerd's room, and there are tons of Lego pieces everywhere UNDER the carpet!! 😱 You must carefully get out of there as soon as possible. If you step on a Lego, you will lose a life. In this version, you will have so much more than the Demo Version: money, shop, menu, pausing, time & highscore and so much more!! What are you waiting for?? :P

So, do I need to pay anything and how to play it then??

First, this game sucks (like really sucks) so ALWAYS 100% free (or until it becomes better). Second,... just google "How to play Minesweeper" man! :P

If this was version 1.1, then where are the 1.0 version and the demo??

 - 1.0: https://dqg.itch.io/legosweeper-full-v-1

 - Demo: https://dqg.itch.io/legosweeper-demo-version-the-lego-builder

But, what is difference between this and v1.0???

- I've updated it quite a lot: A new menu, better gameplay, less lag, and many annoying bugs fixed!! But let me know if there are still bugs in the comments! :)

 - Also, if you like coding and Lego, you may like my channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7WGw-2FL5agpPTCGePwIhQ

If you have any concerns about this project, post a comment below! If you know how to make music for games, contact me at: abusinessemail27@gmail.com

THANKS FOR COMING!! :))
